Package model

Class AccountCollection

java.lang.Object
model.AccountCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AccountCollection extends Object implements Serializable
The AccountCollection class is a wrapper for an ArrayList of Accounts, including other methods that allow for adding and manipulating the array of Accounts for the MemoryGame application.
Author:
Kyle Myint, Louis Romeo, Seth Jernigan, Mustafa Alnidawi
See Also:

    • getAccount

      public Accounts getAccount(String name, String password)
      This method returns the account of specified username and password in the AccountCollection, and null if unfound.
      Parameters:
      name - The username of the account being searched for.
      password - The password of the account being searched for.
      Returns:

    • containsName

      public boolean containsName(String name)
      This method returns whether or not the AccountCollection contains an account with specified username.
      Parameters:
      name - The username being searched for in the AccountCollection.
      Returns:
      True if the AccountCollection contains this username, false otherwise.

    • containsAccount

      public boolean containsAccount(Accounts otherAcct)
      This method returns whether or not the AccountCollection contains an equivalent account.
      Parameters:
      otherAcct - The account being searched for.
      Returns:
      True if the AccountCollection contains an equivalent account, false otherwise.
